item.title: Heavy rains worsen conditions for displaced Gazans, UN warns
item.description: Gaza's health ministry says one baby has died from hypothermia and 11 other people have died in building collapses over the past week.

item.title: The Oscars to leave ABC and stream on YouTube starting in 2029
item.description: The show was hosted by ABC for more than a half-century and reveals the latest major shakeup in Hollywood.

item.title: Starmer tells Abramovich to 'pay up now' or face court
item.description: The Prime Minister said Roman Abramovich should make good on his pledge that money from the sale of Chelsea FC would go to benefit Ukrainians

item.title: Spain to open network of climate shelters
item.description: Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez says the shelters will be in public buildings across the country.

item.title: Jack Smith defends Trump prosecutions in testimony to Congress
item.description: The former US Special Counsel is facing questions about his two defunct criminal investigations into President Donald Trump.
